user.description: Please enter Midea cloud credentials. Those are the ones used from the mobile application.
user.title: Midea cloud credentials

unreachable_appliance.description: We were unable to discover an appliance with id {id}, name {name} on the local network. If you know its address, please enter it to add it to Home Assistant.
unreachable_appliance.title: Appliance address missing

error.invalid_ip_address: Invalid IPv4 address, please enter valid IPv4 address.
error.not_discovered: Unable to find appliance at specified IPv4 address.

abort.single_instance_allowed: Already defined a Midea cloud account. Only a single account is supported for dehumidifier integration.
